titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senate subpoena respondents in the case of "Southern Air Transport, Inc. v. Post-Newsweek Stations of Florida, Inc., et al.".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 3/4/1988--Introduced. Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Jonathan Winer, counsel to Senator Kerry, and any Senator or other Senate employee who may be asked to testify or produce documents in the case of Southern Air Transport, Inc. v. Post-Newsweek Stations of Florida, Inc., et al.
